areas.title: Pay Only for What You Use

service_details.title: Comprehensive Serverless Consulting Services
service_details.subtitle: From initial strategy to post-deployment optimization, AppsCode helps you build robust, high-performing, and cost-optimized serverless applications.

sections.title: Serverless Strategy & Advisory
sections.description: Lay the right foundation for your serverless transformation. Our experts define architecture blueprints, identify trade-offs, and guide you through best practices.
offerings: Assess your current systems and define a tailored roadmap for serverless adoption.
Identify business goals, expected ROI, and implementation priorities.
Deliver a complete migration or modernization plan with a focus on scalability and resilience.

sections.title: Serverless Implementation Services
sections.description: We help you build production-grade serverless applications using AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, Azure Functions, and open-source tools.
offerings: Design and implement event-driven serverless systems optimized for your workloads.
Leverage multi-cloud or hybrid setups for maximum flexibility and performance.
Streamline release cycles and eliminate infrastructure complexity.

sections.title: Serverless CI/CD Automation
sections.description: Automate delivery with CI/CD pipelines built for serverless environments, ensuring rapid iteration and error-free releases.
offerings: Build automated deployment pipelines using AWS SAM, GCP Cloud Build, or GitHub Actions.
Integrate testing, monitoring, and rollback mechanisms for resilience.
Deliver updates faster while maintaining code quality and stability.

sections.title: Managed Serverless Operations
sections.description: Let AppsCode manage your serverless environments—monitoring, optimizing, and maintaining them for peak performance and uptime.
offerings: Continuous monitoring and tuning for performance, latency, and cost optimization.
24×7 health checks and automated incident response.
Focus your team on innovation while we handle day-to-day operations.

sections.title: Serverless Training & Enablement
sections.description: Empower your teams with deep hands-on knowledge of serverless technologies, architecture design, and best practices.
offerings: Custom workshops covering real-world use cases and patterns.
End-to-end learning—from function design to deployment and monitoring.
Build a self-sufficient, serverless-first engineering culture.
